org.csstudio.platform.internal.simpledal
Interface AbstractConnector.IRunnable

Enclosing class:
AbstractConnector
static interface AbstractConnector.IRunnable

Runnable which is used to forward events to process variable value listeners.

Author:
Sven Wende

Method Summary
 void doRun(IProcessVariableValueListener valueListeners)
          Hook which is called only for valid value listeners, which still live in the JVM and have not already been garbage collected.
 

Method Detail

doRun

void doRun(IProcessVariableValueListener valueListeners)
Hook which is called only for valid value listeners, which still live in the JVM and have not already been garbage collected.

Parameters:
valueListeners - a value listener instance (we ensure, that this is not null)
